QuestData.Title: A Nose for Ptrouble
QuestData.Description:
Ah, so you noticed he is missing again.
I would check de east this time. I heard some screeching from that direction.
I am sure he will be fine- after all, what sort of trouble could he get in with you looking after him?
<Wingminder Goja smiles just a touch sarcastically.>
Best find out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Kua'fon in Atal'Gral and rescue him from danger.
